statement.tex: \text{The radius of an air bubble is increasing}\\ \text{at the rate of }\frac{1}{2}\text{ cm/s. At what}\\ \text{rate is the volume of the bubble increasing}\\ \text{when the radius is 1 cm?}
\\ \text{What do we know and what do we have to find?}

reason.tex: \text{The questions asks for the rate at which the}\\ \text{volume of the bubble is increasing, that is }\frac{dV}{dT}
\text{The bubble is a sphere. And hence its volume is }\frac{4}{3}\pi R^3.
